What is the name of the Royal Anthem of: When did the British North America Act come into effect?
What is the meaning of the Remembrance Day poppy?
God Save the Queen (or King): To remember the sacrifice of Canadians who have served or died in wars up to the present day
O Canada: To honour Prime Ministers who have died

What is the name of the Royal Anthem of: Which province is the only officially bilingual province?
What are the provinces of Central Canada and their capital cities?
La Marseillaise: Quebec (Quebec City) and Prince Edward Island (Charlottetown)
